name: Academic Engineers and Architects in Finland (Tekniikan akateemiset)
goal: TEK supports its members in their careers, promotes professional community spirit and competence and builds sustainable welfare society.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives:
Research & innovation
Higher education
Climate & environment
Social and labour market policy
Industrial policy
Employment
Digitalization & data policy
